name: Juice Up
description:
If you experience performance issues, try running on the Microsoft Edge browser.

Game made for the GDB Juice Jam

The main thing missing is screenshake, which I didn't have time to add and am planning to implement after the jam.

Description

Defeat enemies and fill up your juice meter to make your attacks heavier and more impactful!

Instructions

-A/D or left/right arrows to move

-Right click to attack

-Space to jump-attack

Credits:

Programming and character/vfx design by me

Ludum Dare 28 Track 8 by Abstraction

SFX by phoenix1291, mattflat and VOiD1Gaming

Environment assets by Anokolisa
